thread.title: Pizza Hut offers free pizzas to ISRO employees
thread.title_full: Pizza Hut offers free pizzas to ISRO employees

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Pizza Hut offers free pizzas to ISRO employees
text:
(Representational image) The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) on 15th February created a new world record by successfully launching 104 satellites in a single rocket from Sriharikota in India . It was a proud moment for Indians.
In order to celebrate this particular achievement, Pizza Hut took to Twitter to announce that they were offering free pizzas to ISRO employees across the country.
Pizza Hut took to its Twitter page to make the announcement.
As reported by The Quint , Pizza Hut has given away pizzas worth Rs 6 lakh to over 2,000 ISRO employees till date.
